name: calc
help:
Faire un calcul dans Discord.
Liste des fonctions mathÃ©matiques utilisables : https://www.w3schools.com/js/js_math.asp
example:
{bot.prefix}{cmd.name} 5 + 6 / 2
{bot.prefix}{cmd.name} Math.cos(Math.PI / 3)
{bot.prefix}{cmd.name} x = 5; 5 * Math.pow(x, 2) + 2 * x + 7
{bot.prefix}{cmd.name} pow2 = function(x) { return x * x }; pow2(4)
{bot.prefix}{cmd.name} x = [10, 20, 15, 17.5], average = 0; for (i in x) average += x[i] / x.length
